SQLTEST.CONTENT: 更新语句满足完整性约束

SQL_CASE.SQL: CREATE TABLE DML_30025_TABLE(C0 INT DEFAULT 0, C1 FLOAT DEFAULT 0.123456789012345, C2 CHAR(100) DEFAULT 'ABCDEFGHIJKMN', C3 TIMESTAMP DEFAULT '2005-05-17 11:11:11')
INSERT INTO DML_30025_TABLE VALUES(1, 0.1234, 'ABCDEFGHMN', '2005-05-18 11:11:11')
INSERT INTO DML_30025_TABLE SELECT * FROM DML_30025_TABLE
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C0=DEFAULT, C1 = DEFAULT, C2=DEFAULT, C3=DEFAULT WHERE C0=1
SELECT * FROM DML_30025_TABLE
DROP TABLE DML_30025_TABLE
CREATE TABLE DML_30025_TABLE(C0 INT IDENTITY(1, 1), C1 FLOAT)
INSERT INTO DML_30025_TABLE(C1) VALUES(0.123456789012345)
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C1 = 123456789012345 WHERE C0=1
SELECT * FROM DML_30025_TABLE
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C0=2, C1 = 123456789012345 WHERE C0 =1
SET IDENTITY_INSERT DML_30025_TABLE ON
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C0=2, C1 = 123456789012345 WHERE C0 =1
SET IDENTITY_INSERT DML_30025_TABLE OFF
DROP TABLE DML_30025_TABLE
CREATE TABLE DML_30025_TABLE(C0 INT UNIQUE, C1 FLOAT UNIQUE, C2 CHAR(100) UNIQUE, C3 TIMESTAMP UNIQUE)
INSERT INTO DML_30025_TABLE VALUES(1, 0.1234, 'ABCDEFGHMN', '2005-05-18 11:11:11')
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C0=1, C1 = 123456789012345, C2='ABCDEFGHIJKMNO', C3='2005-05-17 11:11:11' WHERE C0=1 AND C1<1 AND C2>='ABCDEFGHIJKMN'
SELECT * FROM DML_30025_TABLE
INSERT INTO DML_30025_TABLE VALUES(2, 0.1234, 'ABCDEFGHMN', '2005-05-18 11:11:11')
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C0=1 WHERE C0=2
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C1=123456789012345 WHERE C0=2
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C2='ABCDEFGHIJKMNO' WHERE C0=2
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C3='2005-05-17 11:11:11' WHERE C0=2
DROP TABLE DML_30025_TABLE
CREATE TABLE DML_30025_TABLE(C0 INT NOT NULL, C1 FLOAT NOT NULL, C2 CHAR(100) NOT NULL, C3 TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)
INSERT INTO DML_30025_TABLE VALUES(1, 0.1234, 'ABCDEFGHMN', '2005-05-18 11:11:11')
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C0=1, C1 = 123456789012345, C2='ABCDEFGHIJKMNO', C3='2005-05-17 11:11:11' WHERE C0=1 AND C1<1 AND C2>='ABCDEFGHIJKMN'
SELECT * FROM DML_30025_TABLE
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C0=NULL WHERE C0=1
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C1=NULL WHERE C0=1
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C2=NULL WHERE C0=1
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C3=NULL WHERE C0=1
DROP TABLE DML_30025_TABLE
CREATE TABLE DML_30025_TABLE(C0 INT PRIMARY KEY, C1 FLOAT NOT NULL, C2 CHAR(100) NOT NULL, C3 TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)
INSERT INTO DML_30025_TABLE VALUES(0, 0.1234, 'ABCDEFGHMN', '2005-05-18 11:11:11')
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C0=1, C1 = 123456789012345, C2='ABCDEFGHIJKMNO', C3='2005-05-17 11:11:11' WHERE C0=0 AND C1<1 AND C2>='ABCDEFGHIJKMN'
SELECT * FROM DML_30025_TABLE
INSERT INTO DML_30025_TABLE VALUES(2, 0.1234, 'ABCDEFGHMN', '2005-05-18 11:11:11')
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C0=2 WHERE C0=1
DROP TABLE DML_30025_TABLE
CREATE TABLE DML_30025_TABLE(C0 INT CHECK(C0<2), C1 FLOAT CHECK(C1<1), C2 CHAR(100) CHECK(C2>'ABCDEAJKMNO'), C3 TIMESTAMP CHECK(C3>'2005-05-17 11:11:11'))
INSERT INTO DML_30025_TABLE VALUES(0, 0.1234, 'ABCDEFGHMN', '2005-05-18 11:11:11')
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C0=1, C1 = 0.1, C2='ABCDEFGHIJKMNO', C3='2005-05-18 11:11:12' WHERE C0=0;
SELECT * FROM DML_30025_TABLE
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C0=2 WHERE C0=1
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C1=123456789012345 WHERE C0=1
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C2='ABCCEFGHIJKMNO' WHERE C0=1
UPDATE DML_30025_TABLE SET C3='2005-05-17 11:11:11' WHERE C0=1
DROP TABLE DML_30025_TABLE
CREATE TABLE DML_30025_TABLE(C0 INT PRIMARY KEY)
CREATE TABLE DML_30025_TEMP(C0 INT, FOREIGN KEY(C0) REFERENCES DML_30025_TABLE(C0))
INSERT INTO DML_30025_TABLE VALUES(1)
INSERT INTO DML_30025_TEMP VALUES(1)
INSERT INTO DML_30025_TABLE VALUES(2)
UPDATE DML_30025_TEMP SET C0=2 WHERE C0=1
SELECT * FROM DML_30025_TEMP
UPDATE DML_30025_TEMP SET C0=3 WHERE C0=2
DROP TABLE DML_30025_TEMP
DROP TABLE DML_30025_TABLE
